item.title: Back to the Beginning
item.description: So I created something very similar to this a couple of years ago, but seemed to fall into the trap of having an overly complicated setup than was needed (it used docker and was complex enough that my first post was actually how to set the damn thing up again) followed by never writing another post again. Here’s my second attempt at this. The plan isn’t for this to be some rambling blog where I put the world to rights or complain how McDonalds got the familay order wrong again, but more a place for me to put notes and ideas that I find myself searching the web for again and again.
